text.21_Chapter, 1_Verse: And he said, â€˜Take please you son, your only one, whom you love, Yitzchak, and go to the land of service and bring him up there for a whole offering on one of the mountains, of which I will tell you.
text.13_Chapter, 17_Verse: And Malchitzedek the king of Jerusalem brought out bread and wine and he served before the Most High Gd.
